author: Sam McNeil | AP
title: Wuhan embraces Yangtze River as virus-hit city reopens
description: The reopening of ferry services on the Yangtze River was an important symbolic step to get business and daily life back to normal in the city where the coronavirus pandemic began
content: Wearing goggles, gloves, a homemade mask and a black trench coat, Chen was checked by security guards in protective suits and bought a 1.5-yuan (20-cent) ferry ticket. He boarded with a dozen other passengers, some pushing electric scooters, and found a bench… [+5737 chars]
